name: Mark KUTNYAK, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, and Pennsylvania State Police et al, Appellees

parties: Mark KUTNYAK, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, and Pennsylvania State Police et al, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of October, 2004, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 261
Mark KUTNYAK, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, and Pennsylvania State Police et al, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 21, 2004.
